00016 //returns the UINT8 ID for the specified sector.
00017 UINT8 GetLoadScreenID( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
00018 {
00019       SECTORINFO *pSector;
00020       UINT8 ubSectorID;
00021       BOOLEAN fNight = FALSE;
00022 
00023       ubSectorID = SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY );
00024       if( NightTime() ) //before 5AM or after 9PM
00025       {
00026             fNight = TRUE;
00027       }
00028       switch( bSectorZ )
00029       {
00030             case 0:
00031                   switch( ubSectorID )
00032                   {
00033                         case SEC_A2:
00034                         case SEC_B2:
00035                               if( fNight )
00036                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTCHITZENA;
00037                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYCHITZENA;
00038                         case SEC_A9:
00039                               if( !DidGameJustStart() )
00040                               {
00041                                     if( fNight )
00042                                           return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTOMERTA;
00043                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYOMERTA;
00044                               }
00045                               return LOADINGSCREEN_HELI;
00046                         case SEC_A10:
00047                               if( fNight )
00048                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTOMERTA;
00049                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYOMERTA;
00050                         case SEC_P3:
00051                               if( fNight )
00052                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTPALACE;
00053                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYPALACE;
00054                         case SEC_H13:
00055                         case SEC_H14: //military installations
00056                         case SEC_I13:
00057                         case SEC_N7:
00058                               if( fNight )
00059                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTMILITARY;
00060                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYMILITARY;
00061                         case SEC_K4: 
00062                               if( fNight )
00063                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTLAB;
00064                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYLAB;
00065                         case SEC_J9:
00066                               if( fNight )
00067                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTPRISON;
00068                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYPRISON;
00069                         case SEC_D2:
00070                         case SEC_D15:
00071                         case SEC_I8:
00072                         case SEC_N4:
00073                               if( fNight )
00074                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTSAM;
00075                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYSAM;
00076                         case SEC_F8:
00077                               if( fNight )
00078                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTHOSPITAL;
00079                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYHOSPITAL;
00080                         case SEC_B13:
00081                         case SEC_N3:
00082                               if( fNight )
00083                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTAIRPORT;
00084                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYAIRPORT;
00085                         case SEC_L11:
00086                         case SEC_L12:
00087                               if( fNight )
00088                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTBALIME;
00089                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYBALIME;
00090                         case SEC_H3:
00091                         case SEC_H8:
00092                         case SEC_D4:
00093                               if( fNight )
00094                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTMINE;
00095                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYMINE;
00096                   }
00097                   pSector = &SectorInfo[ ubSectorID ];
00098                   switch( pSector->ubTraversability[ 4 ] )
00099                   {
00100                         case TOWN:
00101                               if( fNight )
00102                               {
00103                                     if( Random( 2 ) )
00104                                     {
00105                                           return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTTOWN2;
00106                                     }
00107                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTTOWN1;
00108                               }
00109                               if( Random( 2 ) )
00110                               {
00111                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYTOWN2;
00112                               }
00113                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYTOWN1;
00114                         case SAND:  
00115                         case SAND_ROAD:
00116                               if( fNight )
00117                               {
00118                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTDESERT;
00119                               }
00120                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYDESERT;
00121                         case FARMLAND:
00122                         case FARMLAND_ROAD:
00123                         case ROAD:                          
00124                               if( fNight )
00125                               {
00126                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTGENERIC;
00127                               }
00128                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYGENERIC;
00129                         case PLAINS:
00130                         case SPARSE:
00131                         case HILLS:
00132                         case PLAINS_ROAD:
00133                         case SPARSE_ROAD:
00134                         case HILLS_ROAD:
00135                               if( fNight )
00136                               {
00137                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTWILD;
00138                               }
00139                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYWILD;
00140                         case DENSE:
00141                         case SWAMP:
00142                         case SWAMP_ROAD:
00143                         case DENSE_ROAD:
00144                               if( fNight )
00145                               {
00146                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTFOREST;
00147                               }
00148                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYFOREST;
00149                         case TROPICS:
00150                         case TROPICS_ROAD:
00151                         case WATER:
00152                         case NS_RIVER:
00153                         case EW_RIVER:
00154                         case COASTAL:
00155                         case COASTAL_ROAD:
00156                               if( fNight )
00157                               {
00158                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTTROPICAL;
00159                               }
00160                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYTROPICAL;
00161                         default:
00162                               Assert( 0 );
00163                               if( fNight )
00164                               {
00165                                     return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTGENERIC;
00166                               }
00167                               return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYGENERIC;
00168                   }
00169                   break;
00170             case 1:
00171                   switch( ubSectorID )
00172                   {
00173                         case SEC_A10: //Miguel's basement
00174                         case SEC_I13:     //Alma prison dungeon
00175                         case SEC_J9:      //Tixa prison dungeon
00176                         case SEC_K4:      //Orta weapons plant
00177                         case SEC_O3:  //Meduna 
00178                         case SEC_P3:  //Meduna 
00179                               return LOADINGSCREEN_BASEMENT;
00180                         default:                //rest are mines
00181                               return LOADINGSCREEN_MINE;
00182                   }
00183                   break;
00184             case 2:     
00185             case 3:
00186                   //all level 2 and 3 maps are caves!
00187                   return LOADINGSCREEN_CAVE;
00188             default:
00189                   // shouldn't ever happen
00190                   Assert( FALSE );
00191 
00192                   if( fNight )
00193                   {
00194                         return LOADINGSCREEN_NIGHTGENERIC;
00195                   }
00196                   return LOADINGSCREEN_DAYGENERIC;
00197       }
00198 }

00202 //sets up the loadscreen with specified ID, and draws it to the FRAME_BUFFER, 
00203 //and refreshing the screen with it.

00205 {

00227                   else if (iResolution == 2)

00230                   }

00917 
00918       // Sti loadscreen (big image) is not available
00919       if ( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &uiLoadScreen ) == FALSE && iResolution > 0)
00920       {
00921             bShowSmallImage = TRUE;
00922             strcpy(vs_desc.ImageFile, smallImage);
00923       }
00924 
00925       if( gfSchedulesHosed )
00926       {
00927             SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00928             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00929             SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00930             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, 0 );
00931             mprintf( 5, 5, L"Error loading save, attempting to patch save to version 1.02...", vs_desc.ImageFile );
00932       }
00933       else if( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &uiLoadScreen ) )
00934       { //Blit the background image
00935             GetVideoSurface( &hVSurface, uiLoadScreen );
00936 
00937             // Special case -> show the small image centered
00938             if (iResolution > 0 && bShowSmallImage == TRUE)
00939             {
00940                   BltVideoSurfaceToVideoSurface( ghFrameBuffer, hVSurface, 0, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset, 0, NULL );
00941             }
00942             else
00943             {
00944                   BltVideoSurfaceToVideoSurface( ghFrameBuffer, hVSurface, 0, 0, 0, 0, NULL );
00945             }
00946 
00947             DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex( uiLoadScreen );
00948       }
00949       else
00950       { //Failed to load the file, so use a black screen and print out message.
00951             SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00952             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00953             SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00954             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, 0 );
00955             mprintf( 5, 5, L"%S loadscreen data file not found...", vs_desc.ImageFile );
00956       }
00957 
00958       gubLastLoadingScreenID = ubLoadScreenID;
00959       InvalidateScreen( );
00960       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
00961       EndFrameBufferRender();
00962       RefreshScreen( NULL );
00963 }
